attributes.action: Robin Swan health minister must provide the necessary ECMO machine.
attributes.additional_details: Thirty people or more could lose their lives unnecessarily in Northern Ireland because the hospital does not have the equipment.
attributes.background: Provide the necessary equipment ECMO machine for Belfast City Hospital Tower Block and PPE for our nurses.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.
 
If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here: 

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
